subject: A direct radio voice recording
author: Frank Ratka
full_text:
--0-1529795496-1202392427=:8048

--0-2141501674-1202392427=:8048
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

This is a pretty raw recording but it illustrates a cooperation between myself and researchers on the other side. This is done on one frequency, no scanning, no enhancements, and no editing besides being snipped out of the long file. In the filename you will see STD, which in my labeling system means "Standard".

In the clip you will hear me say, "I'm slightly adjusting the tuning knob". Shortly after that you hear a response.

Regards,

Frank R.
